001package _Demos;
002
003import ij.ImagePlus;
004import ij.plugin.filter.Convolver;
005import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
006import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
007
008public class Filter_Demo_A implements PlugInFilter {
009        
010        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
011                return DOES_ALL;                                // works for any type of image!
012        }
013
014        public void run(ImageProcessor I) {
015                float[] H = {                                                   // coefficient array H is one-dimensional!
016                        0.075f, 0.125f, 0.075f,
017                        0.125f, 0.200f, 0.125f,
018                        0.075f, 0.125f, 0.075f };
019
020                Convolver cv = new Convolver();
021                cv.setNormalize(false);                 // turn off kernel normalization
022                cv.convolve(I, H, 3, 3);                // apply the filter H to I
023        }
024}
